## Q1 {-}

Convert the following angle measures in degrees into radians, simplifying all fractions and give answers to 3 significant figures.

1.1 $30\textdegree$

1.2 $105\textdegree$

1.3 $298\textdegree$

1.4 $61\textdegree$

1.5 $353\textdegree$

## Q2 {-}

Convert the following angle measures in radians into degrees. Giving answers to 3 significant figures

2.1 $\frac{\pi}{3}$

2.2 $\frac{2\pi}{3}$

2.3 $\frac{\pi}{7}$

2.4 \frac{5\pi}{7}$

2.5 $5$

2.6 $\frac{3}{4}$
